mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (title, content, createdDate, views, author, pjtId, category) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0, #{author}, #{pjtId}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.title, r.content, r.createdDate, r.views, r.likes, r.dislikes, r.author, r.pjtId, r.category, p.pjtname AS pjtName, p.pjtimg AS pjtImg FROM review r JOIN projectteam p ON r.pjtId = p.pjt_id

SELECT r.id, r.title, r.content, r.createdDate, r.views, r.likes, r.dislikes, r.author, r.pjtId, r.category, p.pjtname AS pjtName, p.pjtimg AS pjtImg FROM review r JOIN projectteam p ON r.pjtId = p.pjt_id WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE review SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, createdDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE review SET dislikes = dislikes + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
